description.brazilian: Destrua todas as caixas de madeira na fase "Ugarite"
description.dutch: Vernietig alle houten kisten in het level Ugarit
description.english: Destroy all the wooden boxes in the "Ugarit" level
description.french: Détruire toutes les caisses en bois dans le niveau "Ougarit"
description.german: Zerstöre alle Holzkisten im Level "Ugarit".
description.italian: Distruggi tutte le casse di legno nel livello "Ugarit"
description.polish: Zniszcz wszystkie drewniane skrzynie w misji "Ugarit"
description.russian: Сломать все деревянные ящики на уровне "Угарит"
description.spanish: Destruye todas las cajas de madera en el nivel "Ugarit"

displayName.brazilian: As coisas são mais admiradas de longe
displayName.dutch: Vanuit de verte lijkt alles beter
displayName.french: De loin, l'admiration est plus grande
displayName.german: Aus der Ferne besehen ist alles schön
displayName.spanish: La admiración es más grande desde lo lejos

description.brazilian: Atinja todos os alvos e inimigos na fase "Ebla"
description.dutch: Raak alle doelwitten en vijanden in het level Ebla
description.english: Hit all the targets and enemies in the "Ebla" level
description.french: Toucher toutes les cibles et ennemis dans le niveau "Ebla"
description.german: Triff alle Ziele und Gegner im Level "Ebla".
description.italian: Colpisci tutti i bersagli e i nemici nel livello "Ebla"
description.polish: Traf wszystkie cele i wrogów w misji "Ebla"
description.russian: Поразить все цели и врагов на уровне "Эбла"
description.spanish: Golpea todos los objetivos y enemigos en el nivel "Ebla"

description.brazilian: Desvie de todos os barris explosivos na fase "Eufrates"
description.dutch: Ontwijk alle exploderende vaten in het level Eufraat
description.english: Dodge all the exploding barrels in the "Euphrates" level
description.french: Éviter tous les tonneaux explosifs dans le niveau "Euphrate"
description.german: Weiche allen explodierenden Fässern im Level "Euphrat" aus.
description.italian: Schiva tutti i barili esplosivi nel livello "Eufrate"
description.polish: Uniknij wszystkich wybuchających beczek w misji "Eufrat"
description.russian: Увернуться ото всех взрывающихся бочек на уровне "Евфрат"
description.spanish: Esquiva todos los barriles explosivos en el nivel "Éufrates"

description.brazilian: Caia para o vazio na fase "Poço Sem Fundo"
description.dutch: Val in de leegte in het level Bodemloze put
description.english: Fall into the void in the "Bottomless Pit" level
description.french: Tomber dans le vide dans le niveau "Puits sans fond"
description.german: Stürze ins Nichts im Level "Bodenlos".
description.italian: Cadi nel vuoto nel livello "Pozzo senza fondo"
description.polish: Wpadnij w otchłań w misji "Bezdenna przepaść"
description.russian: Провалиться в пропасть на уровне "Бездонная яма"
description.spanish: Cae al vacío en el nivel "Pozo sin fondo"

description.brazilian: Tome um merecido banho na fase "Fortaleza de Mari"
description.dutch: Neem een welverdiend bad in het level Fort Mari
description.english: Take a well-deserved bath in the "Mari Fortress" level
description.french: Prendre un bain bien mérité dans le niveau "Forteresse de Mari"
description.german: Nimm ein wohlverdientes Bad im Level "Mari".
description.italian: Fai un meritato bagno nel livello "Fortezza di Mari"
description.polish: Weź zasłużoną kąpiel w misji "Twierdza Mari"
description.russian: Принять заслуженную ванну на уровне "Крепость Мари"
description.spanish: Toma un merecido baño en el nivel "Fortaleza Mari"

description.brazilian: Encontre a tumba escondida na fase "Dur-Curigalzu"
description.dutch: Vind de verborgen tombe in het level Dur-Kurigalzu
description.english: Find the hidden treasure in the "Dur-Kurigalzu" level
description.french: Trouver le trésor caché dans le niveau "Dur Kurigalzu"
description.german: Finde das versteckte Grab im Level "Dur Kurigalzu".
description.italian: Trova la tomba nascosta nel livello "Dur-Kurigalzu"
description.polish: Znajdź ukryty grobowiec w misji "Dur-Kurigalzu"
description.russian: Найти секретную гробницу на уровне "Дур-Куригальзу"
description.spanish: Encuentra la tumba oculta en el nivel "Dur-Kurigalzu"

description.brazilian: Vença a corrida de bigas na primeira tentativa na fase "Selêucia"
description.dutch: Win de strijdwagenrace bij de eerste poging in het level Seleucië aan de Tigris
description.english: Win the chariot race on your first try in the “Seleucia-on-Tigris" level
description.french: Gagner la course de chars en un seul essai dans le niveau "Séleucie du tigre"
description.german: Gewinne das Wagenrennen im Level "Seleukia am Tigris" beim ersten Versuch.
description.italian: Vinci la corsa di carri al primo tentativo nel livello "Seleucia al Tigri"
description.polish: Wygraj wyścig rydwanów za pierwszym podejściem w misji "Seleucja nad Tygrysem"
description.russian: С первой попытки выиграть гонку на колесницах на уровне "Селевкия на Тигре"
description.spanish: Gana la carrera de cuadrigas al primer intento en el nivel "Seleucia del Tigris"

description.brazilian: Chegue ao ponto mais elevado possível na fase "Cidade da Babilônia"
description.dutch: Bereik de hoogste punten in het level De stad Babylon
description.english: Reach the highest point possible in the "City of Babylon" level
description.french: Atteindre le point le plus haut possible dans le niveau "Cité de Babylone"
description.german: Erreiche den höchstmöglichen Punkt im Level "Stadt Babylon".
description.italian: Raggiungi il punto più alto possibile nel livello "Città di Babilonia"
description.polish: Osiągnij najwyższy możliwy punkt w misji "Miasto Babilon"
description.russian: Достигнуть наивысшей точки на уровне "Вавилон"
description.spanish: Alcanza el punto más alto posible en el nivel "Ciudad de Babilonia"

displayName.brazilian: A raiva é a loucura breve
displayName.dutch: Boosheid is een moment van waanzin
displayName.french: La colère est une courte folie
displayName.german: Der Zorn ist ein kurzer Wahnsinn
displayName.italian: La rabbia è una breve follia
displayName.spanish: La ira es una pequeña locura

description.brazilian: Derrote Upsidazi na fase "Jardins da Babilônia"
description.dutch: Versla Orchidehzi in het level De tuinen van Babylon
description.english: Defeat Upsidazi in the "Garden of Babylon" level
description.french: Triompher de Buffehgarni dans le niveau "Jardins de Babylone"
description.german: Besiege Unkraoudin im Level "Gärten von Babylon".
description.italian: Sconfiggi Abuffassain nel livello "Giardini di Babilonia"
description.polish: Pokonaj Upsidazi w misji "Ogród Babilonu"
description.russian: Победить Перевертуса на уровне "Сады Вавилона"
description.spanish: Derrota a Upsidazi en el nivel "Jardín de Babilonia"

description.brazilian: Acenda todos os braseiros na fase "Tchogha Zanbil"
description.dutch: Steek alle toortsen aan in het level Chogha Zanbil
description.english: Light all the braziers in the "Choqa Zanbil" level
description.french: Allumer tous les braseros dans le niveau "Choqa Zanbil"
description.german: Zünde alle Feuerschalen im Level "Tschogha Zanbil" an.
description.italian: Accendi tutti i bracieri nel livello "Choqa Zanbil"
description.polish: Rozpal wszystkie paleniska w misji "Choqa Zanbil"
description.russian: Зажечь все жаровни на уровне "Чога-Занбиль"
description.spanish: Enciende todos los braseros del nivel "Choga Zanbil"

displayName.brazilian: Uma pedra que rola não cria musgo
displayName.english: A rolling stone gathers no moss
displayName.french: La pierre roulée ne se recouvre pas de mousse
displayName.german: Ein rollender Stein setzt kein Moos an
displayName.italian: Pietra che rotola non fa muschio
displayName.polish: Toczący się kamień nie obrasta mchem
displayName.russian: Кому на месте не сидится, тот добра не наживет
displayName.spanish: Una piedra en movimiento no junta musgo

description.brazilian: Conclua a fase com uma vantagem de pelo menos 10 m no barril na "Cidade de Persépolis"
description.dutch: Voltooi het level Persepolis met ten minste 10m voorsprong op het vat
description.english: Finish the level with at least a 10m lead on the barrel in the "City of Persepolis"
description.french: Terminer le niveau avec au moins 10m d'avance sur le tonneau dans "Cité de Persépolis"
description.german: Gewinne das Level "Persepolis" mit mindestens 10 m Vorsprung vor dem Fass.
description.italian: Completa il livello "Città di Persepoli" con almeno 10 m di vantaggio sul barile
description.polish: Ukończ misję, mając co najmniej 10 m przewagi na beczce w "Mieście Persepolis"
description.russian: Завершить уровень "Персеполь", оторвавшись от бочки минимум на 10 м
description.spanish: Termina el nivel con al menos 10m de ventaja en el barril de la "Ciudad de Persépolis"

description.brazilian: Derrote Limpetus na fase "Arg-é Bam"
description.dutch: Versla Hinculus in het level Arg-e Bam
description.english: Defeat Limpetus in the "Arg-e Bam" level
description.french: Triompher de Cahincaha dans le niveau "Arg-E-Bam"
description.german: Besiege Solala im Level "Arg-e Bam".
description.italian: Sconfiggi Tentonia nel livello "Arg-e Bam"
description.polish: Pokonaj Kulejusza w misji "Arg-e Bam"
description.russian: Победить Заплеталию на уровне "Арг-е Бам"
description.spanish: Derrota a Dificultus en el nivel "Arg-e Bam"

description.brazilian: Conclua a fase sem sofrer dano da tempestade de areia na fase "Deserto de Lute"
description.dutch: Voltooi het level Dasht-e Lut zonder schade op te lopen
description.english: Finish the level without taking damage from the sandstorm in the "Lut Desert" level
description.french: Terminer le niveau sans recevoir de dégât de la tempête de sable dans le niveau "Désert de Lut"
description.german: Schließe das Level "Dascht-e Lut" ab, ohne Schaden durch den Sandsturm zu nehmen.
description.italian: Completa il livello "Deserto del Lut" senza subire danni dalla tempesta di sabbia
description.polish: Ukończ misję "Pustynia Lut" bez obrażeń od burzy piaskowej
description.russian: Завершить уровень "Пустыня Лут", не получив урона от песчаной бури
description.spanish: Termina el nivel sin recibir daños de la tormenta de arena en el nivel "Desierto de Lut"

displayName.english: Now is the time to drink

description.brazilian: Conclua a fase "Porta do Inferno" sem tocar na lava
description.dutch: Voltooi het level De hellepoort zonder lava aan te raken
description.english: Finish the level without touching the lava in the "Gates of Hell" level
description.french: Terminer le niveau sans toucher la lave dans le niveau "Porte des enfers"
description.german: Schließe das Level "Pforten der Hölle" ab, ohne die Lava zu berühren.
description.italian: Completa il livello "Porta dell'inferno" senza toccare la lava
description.polish: Ukończ misję "Bramy piekieł" bez dotykania lawy
description.russian: Завершить уровень "Врата Ада", не коснувшись лавы
description.spanish: Termina el nivel sin tocar la lava en el nivel "Las puertas del infierno"

description.brazilian: Use um paraquedas para saltar sobre um abutre na fase "Vale Kal Jeni"
description.dutch: Spring met een parachute op een gier in het level Kal-e Jeni-vallei
description.english: Use a parachute to jump onto a vulture in the "Kal Jeni Valley" level
description.french: Utiliser un parachute pour sauter sur un vautour dans le niveau "Vallée Kal Jeni"
description.german: Lande mit einem Fallschirm auf einem Geier im Level "Kal-e Jeni".
description.italian: Usa un paracadute per saltare su un avvoltoio nel livello "Valle di Kal-e Jeni"
description.polish: Użyj spadochronu, aby wskoczyć na sępa w misji "Dolina Kal Jeni"
description.russian: Запрыгнуть на стервятника с помощью парашюта на уровне "Долина Кал-э Джени"
description.spanish: Utiliza un paracaídas para saltar sobre un buitre en el nivel "Valle de Kal Jeni"

displayName.dutch: De dood is de enige zekerheid

description.brazilian: Derrote Oblivius na fase "Êxodo"
description.dutch: Versla Onnozulus in het level Exodus
description.english: Defeat Oblivius in the "Exodus" level
description.french: Triompher de Perdudevus dans le niveau "Exode"
description.german: Besiege Dilettantibus im Level "Exodus".
description.italian: Sconfiggi Oblivius nel livello "Esodo"
description.polish: Pokonaj Niepomniusa w misji "Exodus"
description.russian: Победить Забвениуса на уровне "Дорога изгнанников"

description.brazilian: Colete todos os capacetes romanos na fase "Castelo de Rashkan"
description.dutch: Verzamel alle Romeinse helmen in het level Rashkan-kasteel
description.english: Collect all the Roman helmets in the "Rashkan Castle" level

description.spanish: Recoge todos los cascos romanos en el nivel "Castillo de Rashkan"

displayName.german: Das bessere Argument hat der Knüppel

description.brazilian: Derrote Bahmbuhzeli sem sofrer dano na fase "Ctesifonte"

description.english: Defeat Bahmbuzehli without taking damage the "Ctesiphon" level
description.french: Triompher d'Embrouillahmini sans prendre de dégât dans le niveau "Ctésiphon"
description.german: Besiege Wirrwarris im Level "Ktesiphon", ohne Schaden zu nehmen.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Imbrollahmini senza subire danni nel livello "Ctesifonte"
description.polish: Pokonaj Szemranisa bez otrzymania obrażeń w misji "Ktezyfon"
description.russian: Победить Хитрозели на уровне "Ктесифон", не получив урона

displayName.dutch: Ik kwam, ik zag en ik overwon
displayName.english: I came, I saw, I conquered
displayName.french: Je suis venu, j'ai vu, j'ai vaincu

description.brazilian: Conclua o modo Aventura
description.dutch: Voltooi het speltype Avontuur

description.french: Terminer le mode aventure

description.italian: Completa la modalità Avventura
description.polish: Ukończ tryb przygody
description.russian: Завершить режим "Приключение"
description.spanish: Completa el Modo aventura

displayName.dutch: Ik gleed uit, ik struikelde en ik viel
displayName.english: I slipped, I stumbled, I fell!
displayName.german: Ich stolperte, ich strauchelte, ich stürzte

description.brazilian: Deslize 200m nas encostas das fases (distância combinada)
description.dutch: Glij 200m over de hellingen in de game (gecombineerde afstand)
description.english: Slide 200m on the slopes in the levels (Combined distance)
description.french: Glisser 200m sur les pentes des niveaux (distance cumulée)
description.german: Rutsche an den Abhängen der verschiedenen Level insgesamt 200 m weit.
description.italian: Scivola per 200 m sulle discese dei livelli (distanza cumulata)
description.polish: Zalicz łącznie 200 m zjazdów na stokach w misjach
description.russian: Проскользить на склонах в общей сложности 200 м
description.spanish: Deslízate 200m en las pendientes en los niveles (Distancia combinada)

displayName.brazilian: Se você quer a paz, prepare-se para a guerra
displayName.dutch: Streef naar vrede, maar verwacht oorlog
displayName.english: If you want peace, prepare for war
displayName.french: Si tu veux la paix, prépare la guerre
displayName.german: Wenn du Frieden willst, bereite dich auf den Krieg vor
displayName.italian: Se vuoi la pace, prepara la guerra
displayName.polish: Jeśli chcesz pokoju, gotuj się do wojny
displayName.spanish: Si quieres paz, prepárate para la guerra

description.brazilian: No Cooperativo, cause dano ao outro jogador com um barril explosivo.
description.dutch: Verwond de andere speler met een exploderend vat in het speltype Coöp
description.english: In Co-op, injure the other player with an exploding barrel.
description.french: En coopération, blesser l'autre joueur avec un tonneau explosif.
description.german: Verletze deinen Mitspieler im Koop-Modus mit einem explodierenden Fass.
description.italian: In co-op, ferisci l'altro giocatore con un barile esplosivo
description.polish: W trybie współpracy zrań drugiego gracza wybuchającą beczką.
description.russian: Нанести урон второму игроку взрывной бочкой в многопользовательском режиме
description.spanish: En cooperativo, hiere al otro jugador con un barril explosivo.

displayName.brazilian: A vida sem amigos seria triste
displayName.english: Life without friends would be sad
displayName.french: Sans amitié, la vie serait triste
displayName.german: Was wäre das Leben ohne Freunde!
displayName.italian: Senza amici, la vita è triste
displayName.russian: Жизнь без друзей — это не жизнь
displayName.spanish: La vida sin amigos debe ser triste

description.brazilian: Como Obelix, carregue Asterix por 50m usando o escudo
description.dutch: Draag als Obelix Asterix 50m op het schild mee
description.english: As Obelix, carry Asterix 50m using the shield
description.french: Avec Obélix, porter Astérix sur 50m avec le bouclier
description.german: Trage Asterix als Obelix 50 m weit auf dem Schild.
description.italian: Con Obelix, trasporta Asterix per 50 m usando lo scudo
description.polish: Jako Obeliks przenieś Asteriksa na odległość 50 m, używając tarczy
description.russian: Играя за Обеликса, пронести Астерикса 50 м на щите
description.spanish: Como Obélix, lleva a Astérix 50m usando el escudo

description.brazilian: No Cooperativo, acertem o mesmo inimigo ao mesmo tempo (exceto chefes)
description.dutch: Raak dezelfde vijand op hetzelfde moment in het speltype Coöp (met uitzondering van bazen)
description.english: In Co-op, hit the same enemy at the same time (Except bosses)
description.french: En coopération, frapper le même ennemi en même temps (hormis les boss)
description.german: Triff im Koop-Modus denselben Gegner zur selben Zeit (außer Bossgegner).
description.italian: In co-op, colpite lo stesso nemico contemporaneamente (esclusi i boss)
description.polish: W trybie współpracy trafcie jednocześnie tego samego wroga
description.russian: Одновременно ударить одного и того же врага (не босса) в многопользовательском режиме
description.spanish: En cooperativo, golpea al mismo enemigo a la vez (excepto jefes)

description.english: Collect all the cuneiform tablets
description.french: Récupérer toutes les tablettes cunéiformes
description.german: Sammle alle Keilschrifttafeln.
description.italian: Raccogli tutte le tavolette cuneiformi
description.polish: Zbierz wszystkie tabliczki z pismem klinowym
description.russian: Собрать все клинописные таблички
description.spanish: Recoge todas las tabletas cuneiformes

displayName.brazilian: Não se espera que ninguém faça o impossível
displayName.english: No one is expected to do the impossible
displayName.german: Über das Können hinaus wird niemand verpflichtet
displayName.polish: Od nikogo nie oczekuje się niemożliwego

description.brazilian: Colete todos os amuletos partas
description.dutch: Verzamel alle Parthische amuletten
description.english: Collect all the Parthian amulets
description.french: Récupérer toutes les amulettes parthes
description.german: Sammle alle parthischen Amulette.
description.italian: Raccogli tutti gli amuleti partici
description.polish: Zbierz wszystkie partyjskie amulety
description.russian: Собрать все парфянские амулеты
description.spanish: Recoge todos los amuletos partos
